subject: Your finance application has been cancelled

body.text: Hi {{receiver.contact_name}} - your finance application has been cancelled.

rows.text: Your finance application has been cancelled due to your request to either the lender or Kanda to cancel your finance application. You can still apply again if this was a mistake. To apply again, you'll need to request a new quote from {{sender.contact_name}}.

rows.subtext: If something isn't right let us know by emailing help@kanda.co.uk.
